message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product for $1000000. I've had a great track record with previous buyers, and I'm confident you'll love it. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. What do you say? Will you take it home for $1000000?
I'd like to buy it, but I need to clarify that I'll only pay $1000000 if it's a high-quality product. If it's low quality, I'll pass on it.
